sentences.en: Indemnity can be deducted from the salary of laborer.

sentences.en: insurance providing indemnity against future liabilities
sentences.cn: 对将来的债务提供保障的保险

sentences.en: Life insurance and personal accident policies are not indemnity contracts.
sentences.cn: 人寿保险和人身意外保险的保险单不是赔偿合同.

sentences.en: Marine insurance contracts are indemnity contracts and require the parties to exercise the utmost good faith.
sentences.cn: 海上保险合同属于赔偿合同,要求双方当事人尽到最大善意的义务.

sentences.en: NEGOTIATION FO DOCUMENTS UNDER RESERVE OR AGAINST INDEMNITY OR GUARANTEE IS PROHIBITED.

sentences.en: The bank can issue a letter of indemnity to the shipper.

sentences.en: The indemnity principle prevents the insured from profiting from their loss.
sentences.cn: 赔偿原则禁止投保人从损失中获利.

sentences.en: The indemnity shall not exceed ten times the laundry fee.

sentences.en: The principle of indemnity is commonly incorporated into all insurance contracts.
sentences.cn: 所有保险合同中都包含赔偿原则.

sentences.cn: 他们在事故后向受害者付了赔偿金.

sentences.cn: 他们被指控未能提供职业保险保障。

sentences.cn: 此赔偿保证书在香港法律范围内生效!

sentences.cn: 根据这项条约, 他们应赔款500万美元.
